Title: New hand
Designer: Gao Eryi (高而颐)Liang Pingbo (梁平伯)Zong Wenlong (宗文龙)Dong Xiaoming (董小明)
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社)
Notes: Children preparing for a relay race near West Lake, Hangzhou. The lake is visible in the background on the right; in the top left corner is the Baochu Pagoda (保俶塔).
